title: Liverpool's Nightmare in Naples
description:
The FC crew discuss Liverpool's defeat to Napoli and ask why things have gone awry under Jurgen Klopp and his defense. Plus, the panel questions why Chelsea sacked Thomas Tuchel and whether their club strategy makes sense after their big summer spending spree. Meanwhile, Bayern Munich and Barcelona produce big UCL victories ahead of their much anticipated clash next week.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Liverpool's huge 4-1 loss to Napoli; Thomas Tuchel sacked by Chelsea; Bayern and Barca win ahead next week's big matchup
